getInstance(java.util.Locale).Description: Returns an instance of DateKeyListener appropriate for the given locale.

ClassDesc: For entering dates in a text field. As for all implementations of @B_android#text#method#KeyListener_E@, this class is only concerned with hardware keyboards. Software input methods have no obligation to trigger the methods in this class.
